passages.text:
You are standing at the end of a road before a small brick building. Around you is a forest.  A small stream flows out of the building and down a gully.
[[Go North->Forest]]
[[Go East->Building]]
[[Go South->Valley]]
[[Go West->Hill]]
passages.name: Road

passages.text:
You are at the Forest!
[[Go back to the Road->Road ]] 
[[Move Deeper into the Forest towards the Cave->Cave]]

links.name: Move Deeper into the Forest towards the Cave

passages.name: Forest

passages.text:
You are at the Building
[[Go back to the road->Road ]] 
[[Search the Building->Secret Room]]
passages.name: Building

passages.text:
You are at the Valley
[[Go to the Forest->Forest]] 
[[Go to the Building->Building]] 
[[Head back to the Road->Road ]]
passages.name: Valley

passages.text:
You are at the Hill
[[Go to the Forest->Forest]] 
[[Go to the Building->Building]] 
[[Go back to the Road->Road ]]
passages.name: Hill

passages.text:
You've made it to the Cave and and found Treasure. Great Job!
[[Go back to the Road->Road ]]
passages.name: Cave

passages.text:
You found the Secret Room and there is a Prisoner inside 
[[Let the prisoner free!->Free Prisoner]]
[[Leave the prisoner. You dont want any trouble->Leave Prisoner]]

links.name: Leave the prisoner. You dont want any trouble

passages.name: Secret Room

passages.text:
Congradulations the Prisoner was a King and he has given you a HUGE reward!!!
[[Return to the road->Road ]]
passages.name: Free Prisoner

passages.text:
The Prisoner that you left was a King. Sadly he will not give you a reward now :(
[[Head back to the road->Road ]]
passages.name: Leave Prisoner
